thread.title: Apple Watch hits SA on October 23
thread.title_full: Apple Watch hits SA on October 23

author: Hadlee Simons
title: Apple Watch hits SA on October 23
text:
Apple Watch hits SA on October 23 Article By: Hadlee Simons Mon, 12 Oct 2015 1:51 PM Share Your Email The Apple Watch with Mickey Mouse face. 
Apple distributor Core Group has revealed an October 23 launch date for the Apple Watch in South Africa. 
Both the Apple Watch and the cheaper Apple Watch Sport will be available come release date. 
Prices for the Sport model start at R5899 for the 38mm variant, up to R6799 for the 42mm model. 
The more expensive Apple Watch (non-Sport version) starts at R9299, going all the way up to R18 499. 
The watch's SA release comes several months after the US launch, which occurred in April 2015. 
Apple's wearable features Force Touch technology (for pressure-sensitive screens) and a "digital crown" for additional inputs. 
It's not the only Apple product coming to the country this month either, as Vodacom and MTN have both confirmed the iPhone 6S range for October 16. Related Articles
